column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////One of the greatest features of this steakhouse is that you may bring one bottle of wine for every two people in your party. This way
column2: you can avoid the 300% mark-up and enjoy your fine wine at a reasonable price! The only ask Bavette's requires is that for every bottle
column3: you "send a glass" to another table in the restaurant. It's best to send it to someone who also has a bottle where they too need to send a glass. :)
